author: Axios
title: 3/4 of Americans are now under coronavirus lockdown
description: If you thought March felt like the longest month in American history, just wait for April and May, when people will be forced to witness spring from the indoors. The big picture: 28 states are in or entering lockdown, with Maryland and Virginia joining those …
content:
If you thought March felt like the longest month in American history, just wait for April and May, when people will be forced to witness spring from the indoors.
The big picture: 28 states are in or entering lockdown, with Maryland and Virginia joining those… [+1514 chars]
